titleStmt.title: The Exercise of musquet and pike as it was performed by beat of drum before His Majesty and His Royal Highness at Putney Heath, October 1, 1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nat. Thompson at the entrance to the Old Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
